name: Tera-Bot
description:
Tera-Bot is a construction game in which the player can create platforms and change the topography of the terrain wherever he goes. 

By changing the world around him, the player procedurally generates environnemental objects.

By exploring, the player can find hidden items that customize the world he built.

Tera-Bot is still a prototype, its development is currently on hold. The team is composed of four students in Game Design at ICAN, Paris.
